TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ValueCollectionParameterReader extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeParameterReader
Public MustInherit Class ValueCollectionParameterReader Inherits MimeParameterReader

Docs.summary: Serves as a base class for readers of incoming request parameters for Web services implemented using HTTP but without SOAP.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader> and other classes in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols> namespace support the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameters or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams. Web service writers and readers use HTTP for transport but don't exchange messages using the SOAP standard. The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader> class provides, among other methods, a common <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Read%2A> method for all service-side readers of collections of name/value pairs into Web method parameters. The name/value pairs have been parsed from an incoming HTTP request.
You typically will not need to use <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader> or its descendant classes directly. The appropriate types are used according to settings in an ASP.NET configuration file (Web.config).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object GetInitializer(class System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo methodInfo) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetInitializer (methodInfo As LogicalMethodInfo) As Object

Docs.param: A that specifies the Web method for which the initializer is obtained.
Docs.summary: Returns an initializer for the specified method.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The object returned by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.GetInitializer%2A> method is the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.InParameters%2A> property of the `methodinfo` parameter. The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.InParameters%2A> property value is an array of type <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo>.
The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.GetInitializer%2A> method is invoked during service initialization. Later, at the time a request is processed, the initializer object is passed to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Initialize%2A> method of another <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader> instance. The other instance performs the actual reading.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(object o) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (o As Object)

Docs.param: A array, obtained through the property of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Initialize%2A> method is invoked at the time a request is processed.
The input parameter, `o`, is obtained by calling the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.GetInitializer%2A> method on another instance during service initialization.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance object[] Read(class System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection collection) cil managed
Protected Function Read (collection As NameValueCollection) As Object()

Docs.param: A object that specifies the collection of name/value pairs containing method parameter names and values.
Docs.summary: Translates a collection of name/value pairs into an array of objects representing method parameter values.
Docs.returns: An array of objects representing method parameter values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Read%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Read%2A> method defined in the two classes derived from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlParameterReader> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HtmlFormParameterReader>. Those two classes' <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Read%2A> methods take an <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> parameter.
